org.sadun.util.polling.jboss
Interface ManagedDirectoryPollerServiceMBean

All Superinterfaces:
ManagedDirectoryPollerMBean
All Known Subinterfaces:
InstrumentedManagedDirectoryPollerServiceMBean
All Known Implementing Classes:
InstrumentedManagedDirectoryPollerService, ManagedDirectoryPollerService
public interface ManagedDirectoryPollerServiceMBean
extends ManagedDirectoryPollerMBean

An extension to the ManagedDirectoryPollerMBean mbean interface which adds JBoss' service interface to the set of exposed methods.

Author:
cris
